nodes.bodyText: Should run this completion stage on the event loop
Should run this completion stage on the event loop

I would deprecate this method/rename the other one to avoid confusing API clients. How do they know which of the 3 methods should they use?
Edit: thinking more about it, the CompletableFuture-returning sync method smells like implementation detail. I would keep the current suggest method and add the async variant. If not, I would expect the CompletableFuture suggest method to return both the sync and async suggestions.

If I had to be completely honest, it's probably better to deprecate Command and split it into RawCommand and RegularCommand, perhaps also introducing CommandContext and CommandExecutionContext interface at the same time, with CommandContext providing command metadata and CommandExecutionContext focusing on the invocation of a command.
My 2 cents.
